title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added documentation for GitHub Copilot commit message generation feature.
Introduced issue dependencies for tracking blocked/blocking work in Issues and Projects.
Cleaned up and combined notes in GitHub Actions events documentation.
Integrated Next.js App Router with improved 404 handling.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for GitHub Copilot commit message generation feature.
- Introduced issue dependencies for tracking blocked/blocking work in Issues and Projects.
- Cleaned up and combined notes in GitHub Actions events documentation.
- Integrated Next.js App Router with improved 404 handling.

### Title
Add Copilot commit message docs, issue dependencies, and App Router integration
